title: Create three prominent blue rectangular buttons

requirements.text: Transform the three action controls at the bottom of the screen into prominent rectangular buttons with solid blue backgrounds. Each button must be a distinct blue rectangle containing both an icon and text label.

quotes: Je veux trois vrais boutons rectangulaires bleus, bien visibles, avec un fond bleu plein

acceptanceCriteria: Three separate rectangular buttons are visible at the bottom of the screen
Each button has a solid blue background fill
Buttons are clearly distinguishable as clickable rectangular elements
All three buttons use consistent styling and dimensions

requirements.text: The first button must display a microphone icon with the text 'Enregistrer mes notes' in black or gray color on the blue background.
acceptanceCriteria: Microphone icon is visible inside the first blue button
Text 'Enregistrer mes notes' appears in the button in black or gray
Icon and text are properly aligned within the button

requirements.text: The second button must display a paper/document icon with the text 'Voir mes notes' in black or gray color on the blue background.
acceptanceCriteria: Paper/document icon is visible inside the second blue button
Text 'Voir mes notes' appears in the button in black or gray
Icon and text are properly aligned within the button

requirements.text: The third button must display a trash/bin icon with the text 'Effacer mes notes' in black or gray color on the blue background.
acceptanceCriteria: Trash/bin icon is visible inside the third blue button
Text 'Effacer mes notes' appears in the button in black or gray
Icon and text are properly aligned within the button

constraints: Maintain existing functionality for recording, viewing, and deleting notes
Keep buttons positioned at the bottom of the screen
Do not modify backend code or note storage logic
nonGoals: Modifying the notes modal or deletion confirmation dialogs
Altering the note counter or transcription display
Adding new features beyond the button styling changes
